overview: The  Covid hysteria began with slogans like “just 15 days to flatten the  curve”, but within a year, it evolved to be “everyone must get  vaccinated”.  Your rights to the absence of coercion and informed consent are now under continual attack! People around the  world are unable to get on planes and trains, access hospitals, attend funerals, go to restaurants and gyms, simply because they do not have a “health” pass.
title: Covidland: The Shot
